verses.plain: Praise ye the LORD. Praise the LORD, O my soul.
While I live will I praise the LORD: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.

tokens.t: While I live will I praise the
: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.

verses.plain: Put not your trust in princes, nor in the son of man, in whom there is no help.

tokens.t: Put not your trust in princes,
in the son of man, in whom

verses.plain: His breath goeth forth, he returneth to his earth; in that very day his thoughts perish.

tokens.t: His breath goeth forth, he returneth to his earth; in that very day his thoughts perish.

verses.plain: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the LORD his God:

tokens.t: the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope

verses.plain: Which made heaven, and earth, the sea, and all that therein is: which keepeth truth for ever:

tokens.t: Which made heaven, and earth, the sea, and all that therein

verses.plain: Which executeth judgment for the oppressed: which giveth food to the hungry. The LORD looseth the prisoners:

tokens.t: Which executeth judgment for the oppressed: which giveth food to the hungry. The

verses.plain: The LORD openeth the eyes of the blind: the LORD raiseth them that are bowed down: the LORD loveth the righteous:

tokens.t: raiseth them that are bowed down: the

verses.plain: The LORD preserveth the strangers; he relieveth the fatherless and widow: but the way of the wicked he turneth upside down.

tokens.t: preserveth the strangers; he relieveth the fatherless and widow: but the way of the wicked he turneth upside down.

verses.plain: The LORD shall reign for ever, even thy God, O Zion, unto all generations. Praise ye the LORD.
